original_text: But it was God who gave them many good things to enjoy. So I cannot accept the ideas of wicked people. But it was God who gave them many good things to enjoy. So I cannot accept the ideas of wicked people. But it was God who gave them many good things to enjoy. So I cannot accept the ideas of wicked people. But it was God who gave them many good things to enjoy.
korean_text: 하나님이 좋은 것으로 그들의 집에 채우셨느니라 악인의 계획은 나에게서 머니라

sentences.original_text: But it was God who gave them many good things to enjoy
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들에게 즐길 수 있는 많은 좋은 것들을 주신 분은 하나님이셨습니다

sentences.original_text: So I cannot accept the ideas of wicked people
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 악인들의 생각을 받아들일 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: But it was God who gave them many good things to enjoy
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들에게 즐길 수 있는 많은 좋은 것들을 주신 분은 하나님이셨습니다
